pages.title: Sun Collector
pages.text: $(byellow)Sun Collector$() is a tool used to collect sun.$(l)Normally aim at the sun and right click to collect it,or right click while shifting to collect a whole range of sun$().

pages.title: Sun Collector Recipe
pages.text: The recipe of Pea Gun need $(l)sunflowers, a daylight detector and Light Essences$().
